## Summary

All major sections of the Kill Team Ctesiphus Expedition campaign rules have been analyzed and converted into GitHub issues.

## Labels to Create

Before creating issues in GitHub, these custom labels need to be created:

```bash
gh label create "phase-system" --color "0366d6" --description "Turn phase mechanics"
gh label create "actions" --color "0366d6" --description "Action types (Scout, Resupply, etc.)"
gh label create "hex-map" --color "7057ff" --description "Map grid, exploration, terrain"
gh label create "resources" --color "008672" --description "SP/CP tracking and management"
gh label create "combat" --color "d73a4a" --description "Battle mechanics"
gh label create "threat" --color "d93f0b" --description "Threat escalation system"
gh label create "gameplay" --color "0e8a16" --description "Core game mechanics, objectives, modes"
gh label create "narrative" --color "c5def5" --description "Story building and campaign narrative"
gh label create "ui" --color "d876e3" --description "User interface components"
gh label create "data" --color "fef2c0" --description "Game data (locations, conditions, etc.)"
gh label create "testing" --color "fbca04" --description "Test infrastructure"
gh label create "accessibility" --color "c2e0c6" --description "Accessibility improvements"
```

## Creating Issues

Once all sections are reviewed, create all issues with:

```bash
# From repository root
for file in .github/issues/[0-9]*.md; do
  issue_num=$(basename "$file" .md | cut -d'-' -f1)
  title=$(head -n 1 "$file" | sed 's/^# //')
  body=$(tail -n +3 "$file")  # Skip title and blank line

  # Extract labels from file (last line starting with labels)
  labels=$(grep -E '^`enhancement`' "$file" | tr -d '`' | tr ', ' ',')

  echo "Creating issue: $title"
  gh issue create --title "$title" --body "$body" --label "$labels"
done
```

Or manually create each issue:

```bash
gh issue create --title "$(head -n 1 .github/issues/001-campaign-setup-map-configuration.md | sed 's/^# //')" --body-file .github/issues/001-campaign-setup-map-configuration.md
```
